Device Capability Management JSON SchemaAppendix A. Change History (Informative)A.1 Approved Version HistoryAppendix B. Device Capabilities VocabularyThis document defines the technical specification for an Object to be used in conjunction with the Lightweight M2Menabler in order to manage Device Capability on the Device.
